name: greeting-tool
description: A VS Code extension that provides a personalized greeting language model tool for VS Code Copilot.

languageModelTools.name: workspace-analyzer_greeting
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Send a personalized greeting to the user. This tool creates time-aware greetings with optional emojis and personalized messages. Use this when the user says 'hello', 'hi', or similar greetings, or when you want to welcome them to the workspace. The tool automatically detects the time of day and creates appropriate greetings.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Send a personalized greeting with time awareness

name.description: The name to greet. Defaults to 'Rishi' if not specified.

timeOfDay.description: Whether to include time-of-day specific greetings (Good morning/afternoon/evening).

includeEmoji.description: Whether to include emojis in the greeting.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
